description: This vegan recipe Is a simple one dish vegan breakfast with lightly caramelised vegetables.
keywords: Frittata,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Egg free,Mushroom,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chickpea Flour Frittata Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large white onion, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a 9 inch skillet or similar oven proof pan to a medium heat and then fry the mushrooms, asparagus and onions in the olive oil for 4 minutes.
Place the rest of the ingredients in a food processor and blend until smooth.
Empty blended ingredients onto the skillet with the vegetables and transfer the dish to the oven.
Bake the entire dish in the oven for 60 minutes before serving or until the edges and top start to brown.
